In today's video I will show you how to remove those columns dynamically using power query. value.title: How to create functions in Power Query
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you how to create a custom function in Power Query.  Custom functions are re-usable pieces of code. value.title: Exception Reporting in Power BI Catch the Error Rows in Power Query
value.excerpt: To build a robust BI system, you need to cater for errors and handle errors carefully. If you build a reporting solution that the refresh of that fails everytime an error occurs, it is not a robust system. Errors can happen by many reasons, In this video, Iâ€™ll show you a way to catch potential errors
